arv11:16: Ihaikatyaḥ pudgalaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvra-rāgo bhavati | tīvra-dveṣo bhavati, tīvra-moho bhavati | so ’bhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-rāgatayā rāgajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-dveṣatayā dveṣajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-mohatayā mohajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati ||
arv11:17: Tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti | mṛdūny-a(tīkṣṇāny-a)śīghra-vāhīny-āsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
arv11:27: Sa evaṁ pañcānāṁ lokottarāṇam-indriyāṇāṁ mṛdutvād-aśīghra-vāhitvāc-ca dhandham evānantaryaṁ samādhiṁ spṛśati | yad-utāsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
arv11:31: Ihaikatyaḥ pudgalaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvra-rāgo bhavati | tīvra-dveṣo [bhavati], tīvra-moho [bhavati] | so ’bhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-rāgatayā rāgajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-dveṣatayā dveṣajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-mohatayā mohajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati ||
arv11:32: Tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti | tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni āsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
arv11:42: Sa eṣāṁ pañcānāṁ lokottarāṇām-indriyāṇām-adhimātratvāt (tīkṣṇatvāt) śīghra-vāhitvāc-ca kṣipram evānantaryaṁ samādhiṁ spṛśati | yad-utāsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
arv11:46: Ihaikatyaḥ pudgalaḥ prakṛtyaivālparāgo bhavati | alpadveṣo bhavati, alpamoho bhavati | so ’lparāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṁ rāgajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṁ dveṣajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | alpamohatayā nābhīkṣṇaṁ mohajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati ||
arv11:47: Tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti | mṛduni na tīkṣṇāni na śīghravāhīni āsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
arv11:57: Sa eṣāṁ pañcānāṁ lokottarāṇām-indriyāṇāṁ dhandhatvād-atīkṣṇātvān-mṛdutvād-aśīghra-vāhitvāc-ca dhandham evānantarya-samādhiṁ spṛśati | yad-utāsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
arv11:61: Ihaikatyaḥ pudgalaḥ prakṛtyaivālparāgo bhavati | alpadveṣaḥ, alpamohaḥ | so ’lparāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṁ rāgajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṁ dveṣajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | alpamohatayā nābhīkṣṇaṁ mohajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati ||
arv11:62: Tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti | tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni āsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
arv11:72: Sa eṣāṁ pañcānāṁ lokottarāṇām-indriyāṇāṁ-adhimātratvāt tīkṣṇatvāt śīghra-vāhitvāc-ca kṣipram evānantaryaṁ samādhiṁ spṛśati | yad-utāsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||
